name: LDS Mormon Coloring Book And Jesus Christ Jigsaw
name_original: LDS Mormon Coloring Book And Jesus Christ Jigsaw
description:
LDS Christian 2 in 1 games is simple game for everyone

1. bible coloring book is the finest coloring page, finger painting, finger coloring app. it will keep you or your kids entertained for hours. have fun with your family as you color beautifully illustrated scenes from the many pictures and all the content is especially themed about Christian! You can even choose to color with crayons that magically stay within the lines!

2. Jesus Christ jigsaw puzzle for kids and adults has been developed especially for all age. this game helps your kids develop matching, tactile and fine motor skills while playing and learn about Christianity. exercise your brain for hours now!

features:
- 3 levels to play: 25 pieces, 49 pieces and 100 pieces
- the game has child-friendly interface, is easy to use, and fun to play!
- solve button can help you to complete

how to play:
1. choose jigsaw pieces level
2. when complete jigsaw, you will receive star and coin for buy new pictures
